1 #include <diff_drive/robot_hardware_interface.h>
2 // #include <ros_control_example/robot_hardware_interface.h>

4 ROBOTHardwareInterface::ROBOTHardwareInterface(ros::NodeHandle& nh) : nh_(nh) {
5  init();
6  controller_manager_.reset(new controller_manager::ControllerManager(this, nh_));
7  loop_hz_=5;
8  ros::Duration update_freq = ros::Duration(1.0/loop_hz_);
9 
10  pub = nh_.advertise<rospy_tutorials::Floats>("/joints_to_aurdino",10);
11  client = nh_.serviceClient<diff_drive::joint_state>("/read_joint_state");
12 
13  non_realtime_loop_ = nh_.createTimer(update_freq, &ROBOTHardwareInterface::update, this);
14 }
15 
16 ROBOTHardwareInterface::~ROBOTHardwareInterface() {
17 }
18 
19 void ROBOTHardwareInterface::init() {
20  // Initialization of the robot's resources (joints, sensors, actuators) and
21  // interfaces can be done here or inside init().
22  // E.g. parse the URDF for joint names & interfaces, then initialize them
23  /* Create a JointStateHandle for each joint and register them with the JointStateInterface.
24  ** connect and register the joint state interface
25  */
26  hardware_interface::JointStateHandle state_handle_a("joint1", &pos[0], &vel[0], &eff[0]);
27  jnt_state_interface_.registerHandle(state_handle_a);
28 
29  // left joint
30  hardware_interface::JointStateHandle state_handle_b("joint2", &pos[1], &vel[1], &eff[1]);
31  jnt_state_interface_.registerHandle(state_handle_b);
32 
33  // Register the JointStateInterface containing the read only joints
34  // with this robot's hardware_interface::RobotHW.
35  registerInterface(&jnt_state_interface_);
36 
37  // connect and register the joint position interface
38  // Create a JointHandle (read and write) for each controllable joint
39  // using the read-only joint handles within the JointStateInterface and
40  // register them with the JointEffortInterface.
41  hardware_interface::JointHandle effort_handle_a(jnt_state_interface_.getHandle("joint1"), &cmd[0]);
42  effort_joint_interface_.registerHandle(effort_handle_a);
43 
44  hardware_interface::JointHandle effort_handle_b(jnt_state_interface_.getHandle("joint2"), &cmd[1]);
45  effort_joint_interface_.registerHandle(effort_handle_b);
46 
47  // Register the JointEffortInterface containing the read/write joints
48  // with this robot's hardware_interface::RobotHW.
49  registerInterface(&effort_joint_interface_);
50 }
51 
52 void ROBOTHardwareInterface::update(const ros::TimerEvent& e) {
53  elapsed_time_ = ros::Duration(e.current_real - e.last_real);
54  read();
55  controller_manager_->update(ros::Time::now(), elapsed_time_);
56  write(elapsed_time_);
57 }
58 
59 void ROBOTHardwareInterface::read() {
60 
61  // joint_read.request.req=1.0;
62 
63  if(client.call(joint_read))
64  {
65  pos[0] = angles::from_degrees(joint_read.response.pos1);
66  pos[0] = angles::normalize_angle(pos[0]);
67  vel[0] = angles::from_degrees(joint_read.response.vel1);
68 
69  pos[1] = angles::from_degrees(joint_read.response.pos2);
70  pos[1] = angles::normalize_angle(pos[1]);
71  vel[1] = angles::from_degrees(joint_read.response.vel2);
72  ROS_INFO("Current Pos: %.2f, %.2f, Vel: %.2f, %2f",pos[0], vel[0], pos[1], vel[1]);
73 /*
74 if more than one joint,
75  get values for joint_position_2, joint_velocity_2,......
76 */
77 
78  }
79  else
80  {
81  pos[2] = {0};
82  vel[2] = {0};
83  }
84 }
85 
86 void ROBOTHardwareInterface::write(ros::Duration elapsed_time) {
87 
88  // effortJointSaturationInterface.enforceLimits(elapsed_time);
89  joints_pub.data.clear();
90  joints_pub.data.push_back(cmd[0]);
91  joints_pub.data.push_back(cmd[1]);
92 /*
93 if more than one joint,
94  publish values for joint_effort_command_2,......
95  pub vl and vr to topic /joints_to_aurdino, subscribed by arduino
96 */
97  ROS_INFO("PWM Cmd: [%5.2f, %5.2f]", cmd[0], cmd[1]);
98  pub.publish(joints_pub);
99 }

101 int main(int argc, char** argv)
102 {
103  // ros::init(argc, argv, "single_joint_hardware_interface");

108  ROBOTHardwareInterface ROBOT(nh);
109  //spinner.start();
110  spinner.spin();
111  //ros::spin();
112  return 0;
